statements: SELECT recipe_id, recipe_name FROM recipes;
SELECT recipe_name, recipe_description FROM recipes ORDER BY recipe_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id = 1;
SELECT recipe_name, UPPER(recipe_description) AS description FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id = 2;
SELECT DISTINCT recipe_name FROM recipes ORDER BY recipe_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM recipes ORDER BY recipe_name DESC;
SELECT recipe_name, recipe_description FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id > 5;
SELECT recipe_name, LENGTH(recipe_description) AS description_length FROM recipes WHERE recipe_name LIKE '%cake%';
SELECT AVG(recipe_id) AS avg_recipe_id FROM recipes;
SELECT recipe_name, SUBSTRING(recipe_description, 1, 50) AS short_description FROM recipes WHERE LENGTH(recipe_description) > 100 ORDER BY recipe_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM recipe_images;
SELECT recipe_id, image_url FROM recipe_images WHERE recipe_id = 1;
SELECT recipe_name, cooking_time, ingredients FROM recipe_details;
SELECT * FROM recipe_details WHERE cooking_time < 30;
SELECT * FROM recipe_details ORDER BY recipe_name ASC;
SELECT recipe_id, image_url, image_description FROM recipe_images WHERE recipe_id = 1;
SELECT recipe_name, cooking_time, ingredients FROM recipe_details WHERE cooking_time < 30;
SELECT * FROM recipe_images JOIN recipe_details ON recipe_images.recipe_id = recipe_details.recipe_id;
SELECT recipe_id, recipe_name, instructions FROM recipe_details WHERE recipe_name LIKE '%pasta%';
SELECT recipe_id, recipe_name, ingredients FROM recipe_details ORDER BY ingredients DESC;
SELECT * FROM recipes;
SELECT recipe_name, recipe_description FROM recipes;
SELECT recipe_name, recipe_image FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ingredients ORDER BY ingredient_name DESC;
SELECT recipe_name, ingredient_name, ingredient_quantity FROM recipes JOIN ingredients ON recipes.recipe_id = ingredients.ingredient_id;
SELECT recipe_id, recipe_name, recipe_description FROM recipes;
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE ingredient_unit = 'cup';
SELECT recipe_name, r.recipe_id, ingredient_name, ingredient_quantity FROM recipes r JOIN ingredients i ON r.recipe_id = i.ingredient_id;
SELECT * FROM recipe_images WHERE image_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;

SELECT r.recipe_id, r.recipe_name, i.ingredient_name, i.ingredient_quantity, i.ingredient_unit FROM recipes r JOIN ingredients i ON r.recipe_id = i.ingredient_id ORDER BY r.recipe_name DESC, i.ingredient_quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM RecipeImages;
SELECT recipe_name, chef_name, image_url FROM RecipeImages ORDER BY chef_name DESC;
SELECT tag_name FROM RecipeTags WHERE tag_id = 2;
SELECT ingredient_name FROM RecipeIngredients WHERE ingredient_name LIKE '%salt%';
SELECT step_id, step_description FROM RecipeSteps ORDER BY step_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM RecipeImages WHERE chef_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT recipe_name, chef_name FROM RecipeImages WHERE chef_name = 'Jane Smith';
SELECT image_url FROM RecipeImages WHERE chef_name = 'John Doe' AND recipe_name = 'Pasta';
SELECT * FROM RecipeTags ORDER BY tag_name DESC;
SELECT ingredient_name FROM RecipeIngredients WHERE ingredient_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM recipes;
SELECT recipe_id, recipe_name FROM recipes ORDER BY recipe_id DESC;
SELECT recipe_id, recipe_name, recipe_image_url FROM recipes WHERE recipe_name LIKE '%pasta%';
SELECT recipe_id, recipe_name, ingredient_name, ingredient_quantity FROM recipes JOIN ingredients ON recipes.recipe_id = ingredients.recipe_id;
SELECT recipe_id, recipe_name, instruction_order, instruction_description FROM recipes JOIN instructions ON recipes.recipe_id = instructions.recipe_id WHERE recipes.recipe_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id = 1;
SELECT recipe_name, recipe_image_url FROM recipes WHERE recipe_name LIKE '%Spaghetti%';
SELECT recipe_name, ingredient_name, ingredient_quantity FROM recipes INNER JOIN ingredients ON recipes.recipe_id = ingredients.recipe_id WHERE recipe_name = 'Lasagna';

SELECT recipe_name, instruction_order, instruction_description FROM instructions JOIN recipes ON instructions.recipe_id = recipes.recipe_id WHERE instruction_order < 4 ORDER BY recipe_name, instruction_order DESC;

SELECT recipe_name, category_name FROM recipes JOIN recipe_categories ON recipes.recipe_id = recipe_categories.recipe_id JOIN categories ON recipe_categories.category_id = categories.category_id WHERE category_name = 'Desserts';
